description:
Get ready for your run or hike with the high-waisted side pocket leggings. These leggings offer ample storage space for your essentials, anti-chafing seams, and abrasion-resistant fabric to ensure maximum comfort. Featuring a drawcord waistband for an adjustable fit, you'll be ready for any adventure that comes your way.

  • Side pockets, easy-access storage for your on-the-go essentials
  • Drawcord at the waistband allows you to customize the fit to your preferences
  • Fitted style provides the perfect balance of flexibility and support
  • 27in Inseam
  • Certified B Corporation: Certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
name: MPG Substance High-Rise Side Pocket Legging - Women's
